itunes:title: Episode 579 - DB Sports Companion Show 04/14/20 - Special Guest New England Patriot Marshall Newhouse
title: Episode 579 - DB Sports Companion Show 04/14/20 - Special Guest New England Patriot Marshall Newhouse
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway welcome special guest professional football offensive tackle Marshall Newhouse to discuss Tom Brady leaving the Patriots after 20 years, will there be an NFL season in the fall, the shuttering of the XFL, what it's like to...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway welcome special guest professional football offensive tackle Marshall Newhouse to discuss Tom Brady leaving the Patriots after 20 years, will there be an NFL season in the fall, the shuttering of the XFL, what it's like to play with Tom Brady, Drew Brees, and Aaron Rodgers, and discuss Marshall’s top picks for the drafting season.

Advertising Inquiries: https://redcircle.com/brands Privacy & Opt-Out: https://redcircle.com/privacy
description:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway welcome special guest professional football offensive tackle Marshall Newhouse to discuss Tom Brady leaving the Patriots after 20 years, will there be an NFL season in the fall, the shuttering of the XFL, what it's like to play with Tom Brady, Drew Brees, and Aaron Rodgers, and discuss Marshall’s top picks for the drafting season.
